title: How change collision detection works
content:
If you have correctly set up the change collision detection feature, a user is unable to save a change that collides according to the rule configuration. The system displays a warning message, and the user must reschedule the change to avoid all collisions before the user can save the record.

Note The change collision detection feature takes into account only active changes.

Related topics

  • Change collision detection
  • How to enable change collision detection
